snippet: A retired fire officer who helped rebuild the city's fire department after the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks will be named the its new commissioner, according to two officials briefed on Mayor Bill de Blasio's decision....

headline.print_headline: AP Sources: NY Mayor to Name Fire Department Boss
headline.main: AP Sources: NY Mayor to Name Fire Department Boss

lead_paragraph: A retired fire officer who helped rebuild the city's fire department after the Sept. 11 terrorist attacks will be named the its new commissioner, according to two officials briefed on Mayor Bill de Blasio's decision.
